entries.meaning: An energetic movement towards or against something; a push, a strike.
examples: [T]he vivacity of these trains of ideas, passing in the imagination, is greatly increased by  [â€¦]  their not being disturbed or dissevered either by the appluses of external bodies, as in surprize; or by our voluntary exertions in comparing them with our previous knowledge of things, as in reasoning upon them.

entries.meaning: (astronomy) A close approach of two heavenly bodies; a conjunction or occultation.
